abstract: BlackRock’s chief executive, Laurence Fink, is worried that some financial regulatory proposals under consideration could do more harm than good.
snippet: BlackRock’s chief executive, Laurence Fink, is worried that some financial regulatory proposals under consideration could do more harm than good.
lead_paragraph: BlackRock‘s chief executive, Laurence D. Fink, is worried that some financial regulatory proposals under consideration could do more harm than good.

headline.main: BlackRock Chief Sees Danger in Some Changes
